physical_appearance: This is a collared long-sleeved purple dress with embroidered floral motifs in gold threading.
sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. Beyond wedding gowns, she also designed dresses for her female relatives.  This mother of the bride dress was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister, Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy). It was worn by Mrs Florence Chong at her daughter Colleenâ€™s wedding in July 1973.
title_text: Purple Dress with Embroidered Floral Motifs in Gold Threading by Sylvia Kho nee Wong Sien Moy  Purple Dress with Embroidered Floral Motifs in Gold Threading
